properties.code:
/** Modify the description here. Modify the function name and parameters as needed. One function per template is recommended; create a new code template for each new function.
@param {String} arg1 - arg1 description @return {String} return description */ function JsonECT() { return { ECTKey:"", SessionKey:"", TreatNum:"", TreatTime:"", Error: false, StaticOhms:"", Intensity:"", PulseWidthDelivered:"", FrequencyDelivered:"", DurationDelivered:"", CurrentDelivered:"", ChargeDelivered:"", EnergyDelivered:"", DynamicOhmsDelivered:"", EEGSeizureTime:"", MotorTime:"", EEGArtifacts:"", EEGAdequacy:"", EEGNote:"", EEGLevel:"", EEGChannels:"", EEGAge:"", EEGPlacement:"", EEGTreatNum:"", EEGMaintFlag:"", LogChannels:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", ChType:"", ChLabel:"", PulseWidthSetting:"", FrequencySetting:"", DurationSetting:"", CurrentSetting:"", ChargeSetting:"", EnergySetting:"", DynamicOhmsSetting:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UserDef:"", UniD: false, ECT_State:"", ECT_Ver:"", ECT_FormID:"", Lock: false, SerialNumber:"", ECTConfig:"", IntensityDelivered:"", ECTPlacement:"" } }

/** Modify the description here. Modify the function name and parameters as needed. One function per template is recommended; create a new code template for each new function.
@param {String} arg1 - arg1 description @return {String} return description */ function JsonOutput2() { return { MRN:"", GivenName:"", FamilyName:"", DateOfBirth:"", Sex:"", FrequencyDelivered:"", FrequencySetting:"", CurrentDelivered:"", CurrentSetting:"", PulseWidthDelivered:"", PulseWidthSetting:"", DurationDelivered:"", DurationSetting:"", EnergyDelivered:"", EnergySetting:"", DynamicOhmsDelivered:"", DynamicOhmsSetting:"", StaticOhms:"", Date:"" } }
